name: Throw Letters!
description:
A tiny game made in 6 hours for a Unity excercice!

Play with your mouse

  • Move the camera with your mouse
  • Throw letters by clicking on Left Click
  • Try to sort as much letters as you can !

Made by

  • Dournaux Nathan

Assets from the Assets store

  • GLASSOFCOINS - Furniture Asset Pack
  • House Interior
